titles.title: To provide clarification in the reimbursement to States for federally funded employees carrying out Federal programs during the lapse in appropriations between November 14, 1995, through November 19, 1995.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources and Intergovernmental Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 12/14/1995--Introduced. Amends specified Federal law to declare that, if a State used State funds to continue carrying out a Federal program during the period beginning November 14, 1995, through November 19, 1995, or if a State furloughed federally funded employees carrying out a Federal program during such period, the State shall be reimbursed for expenses that would have been paid by the Federal Government during such period had appropriations been available, and for expenses that the State incurs if it reimburses such furloughed employees, plus interest.
